PROPOSAL.Deskripsi_Masalah: Current website is outdated and not mobile-friendly.
PROPOSAL.Goals: Increase conversion rate by 20% and improve user experience.
PROPOSAL.Informasi_Tambahan: Looking for students with expertise in UI/UX and front-end development.

PROPOSAL.Deskripsi_Masalah: No dedicated mobile app for managing company events.
PROPOSAL.Goals: Develop an intuitive app for event registration and scheduling.
PROPOSAL.Informasi_Tambahan: Need students familiar with native mobile development (iOS/Android).

PROPOSAL.Deskripsi_Masalah: Lack of automated tools for analyzing market sentiment from social media.
PROPOSAL.Goals: Build an AI model to analyze sentiment and generate reports.
PROPOSAL.Informasi_Tambahan: Seeking students with strong background in NLP and machine learning.

PROPOSAL.Deskripsi_Masalah: Current data backup solution is unreliable and not scalable.
PROPOSAL.Goals: Implement a robust and scalable cloud-based backup system.
PROPOSAL.Informasi_Tambahan: Experience with AWS or Azure is a plus.

PROPOSAL.Deskripsi_Masalah: Low organic traffic to the online store.
PROPOSAL.Goals: Improve search engine ranking and increase organic traffic by 30%.
PROPOSAL.Informasi_Tambahan: Knowledge of SEO best practices and content marketing.

PROPOSAL.Deskripsi_Masalah: Need a prototype for a new telemedicine platform.
PROPOSAL.Goals: Develop a basic functional prototype for patient-doctor consultations.
PROPOSAL.Informasi_Tambahan: Familiarity with healthcare industry regulations is beneficial.

PROPOSAL.Deskripsi_Masalah: Students find learning materials unengaging.
PROPOSAL.Goals: Create an interactive gamified module to improve student engagement.
PROPOSAL.Informasi_Tambahan: Experience in game design or educational technology.

PROPOSAL.Deskripsi_Masalah: Lack of real-time energy consumption monitoring in smart homes.
PROPOSAL.Goals: Research and develop a prototype for a smart energy monitoring system.
PROPOSAL.Informasi_Tambahan: Background in IoT and embedded systems.

PROPOSAL.Judul_Project: Fraud Detection System for Online Transactions
PROPOSAL.Deskripsi_Masalah: Increasing number of fraudulent online transactions.
PROPOSAL.Goals: Build a machine learning-based system to detect and prevent fraud.
PROPOSAL.Informasi_Tambahan: Expertise in anomaly detection and big data.

PROPOSAL.Deskripsi_Masalah: Lack of transparency and traceability in the supply chain.
PROPOSAL.Goals: Explore the feasibility of using blockchain for supply chain optimization.
PROPOSAL.Informasi_Tambahan: Interest in blockchain technology and logistics.

PROPOSAL.Deskripsi_Masalah: Employees lack basic cybersecurity knowledge, leading to security risks.
PROPOSAL.Goals: Develop an interactive module to educate employees on cybersecurity best practices.
PROPOSAL.Informasi_Tambahan: Seeking students with knowledge in web development and cybersecurity principles.

PROPOSAL.Deskripsi_Masalah: Lack of engaging educational tools for financial literacy among young adults.
PROPOSAL.Goals: Create a fun and interactive mobile game to teach basic financial concepts.
PROPOSAL.Informasi_Tambahan: Experience with Unity or Flutter for mobile game development is preferred.

PROPOSAL.Deskripsi_Masalah: High volume of repetitive customer inquiries overloading support staff.
PROPOSAL.Goals: Develop an AI chatbot to automate responses to common customer questions.
PROPOSAL.Informasi_Tambahan: Seeking students with expertise in natural language processing and chatbot frameworks.

PROPOSAL.Deskripsi_Masalah: Generic e-learning content leads to low student engagement and completion rates.
PROPOSAL.Goals: Build a recommendation system that tailors learning paths based on individual student performance and preferences.
PROPOSAL.Informasi_Tambahan: Background in recommendation systems and educational technology.

PROPOSAL.Deskripsi_Masalah: Increasing traffic congestion in urban areas affecting productivity and environment.
PROPOSAL.Goals: Develop a simulation model to analyze traffic flow and propose optimal traffic light synchronization.
PROPOSAL.Informasi_Tambahan: Interest in urban planning, traffic engineering, and simulation tools.

PROPOSAL.Deskripsi_Masalah: Lack of real-time visibility into product movement within the supply chain.
PROPOSAL.Goals: Implement an RFID-based tracking system to provide end-to-end traceability for products.
PROPOSAL.Informasi_Tambahan: Familiarity with RFID technology and database management.

PROPOSAL.Deskripsi_Masalah: Inefficient waste collection routes leading to high operational costs and environmental impact.
PROPOSAL.Goals: Research and develop an IoT system for smart waste bins to optimize collection routes.
PROPOSAL.Informasi_Tambahan: Interest in environmental engineering and sensor networks.

PROPOSAL.Deskripsi_Masalah: Frequent unexpected breakdowns of industrial machinery causing production delays.
PROPOSAL.Goals: Build a predictive maintenance system using sensor data and machine learning to forecast equipment failures.
PROPOSAL.Informasi_Tambahan: Expertise in time series analysis and industrial IoT data.

PROPOSAL.Deskripsi_Masalah: Customers struggle to visualize products in their own space before purchasing online.
PROPOSAL.Goals: Develop an AR mobile application allowing users to virtually place products in their environment.
PROPOSAL.Informasi_Tambahan: Experience with AR development frameworks (e.g., ARKit, ARCore).

PROPOSAL.Deskripsi_Masalah: High demand for unique and engaging marketing content with limited human resources.
PROPOSAL.Goals: Create an AI tool to automatically generate marketing copy for various platforms.
PROPOSAL.Informasi_Tambahan: Seeking students with strong background in generative AI models and content strategy.

PROPOSAL.Deskripsi_Masalah: Concerns about transparency and integrity in traditional voting processes.
PROPOSAL.Goals: Develop a secure and verifiable voting system using blockchain technology.
PROPOSAL.Informasi_Tambahan: Familiarity with Solidity and decentralized application development.

PROPOSAL.Deskripsi_Masalah: One-size-fits-all learning approach is not effective for diverse student needs.
PROPOSAL.Goals: Create an e-learning platform that adapts content and pace based on individual learner progress.
PROPOSAL.Informasi_Tambahan: Experience with educational technology and machine learning algorithms for personalization.

PROPOSAL.Deskripsi_Masalah: Inefficient resource utilization (water, fertilizer) in traditional farming methods.
PROPOSAL.Goals: Develop an IoT system to monitor soil conditions, weather, and crop health for optimized resource management.
PROPOSAL.Informasi_Tambahan: Interest in agricultural technology and sensor data analysis.

PROPOSAL.Deskripsi_Masalah: Rising financial fraud cases impacting customer trust and company revenue.
PROPOSAL.Goals: Build an AI model to predict and detect fraudulent financial transactions in real-time.
PROPOSAL.Informasi_Tambahan: Expertise in anomaly detection, financial data, and strong analytical skills.

PROPOSAL.Deskripsi_Masalah: High costs and slow delivery times in traditional last-mile logistics.
PROPOSAL.Goals: Develop a prototype for an autonomous drone delivery system to improve efficiency.
PROPOSAL.Informasi_Tambahan: Background in robotics, aerospace engineering, and logistics optimization.

PROPOSAL.Deskripsi_Masalah: Traditional authentication methods are vulnerable to phishing and brute-force attacks.
PROPOSAL.Goals: Research and develop a system using behavioral biometrics (e.g., typing patterns) for secure user authentication.
PROPOSAL.Informasi_Tambahan: Interest in cybersecurity, machine learning for pattern recognition.

PROPOSAL.Judul_Project: VR Training Simulation for Emergency Services
PROPOSAL.Deskripsi_Masalah: Current training methods for emergency services are costly and lack realism.
PROPOSAL.Goals: Develop a virtual reality simulation to provide realistic training scenarios for first responders.
PROPOSAL.Informasi_Tambahan: Experience with VR development platforms (e.g., Unity, Unreal Engine) and 3D modeling.

PROPOSAL.Deskripsi_Masalah: Lack of transparency in AI-driven medical diagnostic tools hindering trust and adoption.
PROPOSAL.Goals: Research and implement Explainable AI techniques to make medical AI predictions understandable to clinicians.
PROPOSAL.Informasi_Tambahan: Strong background in deep learning, medical imaging, and AI ethics.

PROPOSAL.Deskripsi_Masalah: Students find STEM subjects challenging and unengaging with traditional teaching methods.
PROPOSAL.Goals: Create a web-based gamified platform to make learning STEM concepts fun and interactive.
PROPOSAL.Informasi_Tambahan: Experience in web game development and educational psychology.

PROPOSAL.Deskripsi_Masalah: High energy consumption and inefficient resource management in commercial buildings.
PROPOSAL.Goals: Develop an IoT-based system to monitor and optimize energy usage in smart buildings.
PROPOSAL.Informasi_Tambahan: Interest in building automation, energy efficiency, and sensor integration.

PROPOSAL.Deskripsi_Masalah: Customer service response time is slow due to high volume of inquiries.
PROPOSAL.Goals: Automate responses to common questions and reduce workload for support staff.
PROPOSAL.Informasi_Tambahan: Looking for students with experience in NLP and chatbot frameworks.

PROPOSAL.Judul_Project: Mobile App for Smart Home Control
PROPOSAL.Deskripsi_Masalah: Users need a unified app to control all smart home devices.
PROPOSAL.Goals: Develop a mobile app for seamless smart home device integration.
PROPOSAL.Informasi_Tambahan: Experience with IoT protocols and mobile development required.
